title: Urgen repair works on East-West Line

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services on the EWL are running normally now.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train svcs btwn #Queenstown & #Bugis are progressively returning to normal. Free regular bus svcs are still available.
[EWL] UPDATE: Our engineers are currently carrying out urgent repair works. For more information, please refer to: https://t.co/Ycvp6Hkoak.
[EWL] UPDATE: No train svc from 11.30am btwn #Queenstown & #Bugis both bounds for up to 30 mins due to urgent repair works.
